document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing the circular Wyrm Bay on the eastern shore of Dragonisle.
document_data.name: Wyrm Bay
document_data.region: The [[Pirate Isles]], the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Wyrm Bay''' was found within the [[Pirate  Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: This roughly circular bay formed much of the eastern edge of [[Dragonisle]]
document_data.Description: The waters of Wyrm Bay were quite clear.
document_data.Inhabitants: Wyrm Bay was so named because of a large population of territorial [[dragon turtle]]s that lived beneath the waves. The dragon turtles were fiercely protective and could easily capsize ships if they weren't busy fighting each other. Safe passage through Wyrm Bay was often directly related to the quality of tribute or treasure offered to the dragon turtles.
